page.title: 20AN ENTERTAINER
page.content: In{1983}Jimmy celebrated his{50th} year with his band. He has written around{200}songs. He has got{nine} accordions and they are all in good condition. A button-key accordion used to cost just under{Â£200}but since they are not made any more they cost up to{ {Â£2000. Jimmy Shand}does not class himself as a teacher but he will help and advise anyone. He thinks the accordion is becoming a more popular instrument to play. He taught himself to play the accordion and he also plays the mouth organ and violin. As a young man he enjoyed riding motorbikes and sailing. On the{11th}of{May, 1985}he went to {Oban}to name a diesel engine, number{ {37188, Jimmy Shand,}after himself. He was awarded an{M.A.}Degree from{Dundee {University}on the{12th}of{July 1985. He raises a lot of money for charity.
